w :  would you like to go to the dance with me tonight ?
m :  i ' d love to  but i ' m just getting over my cold .

question: will the man go dancing with the woman tonight ?
choice: he will go in spite of the cold weather .
he won ' t go since he is not feeling well .
he will go when he feels better .
answer: he won ' t go since he is not feeling well .
